name: Gerald CRISWELL, III and Tracey Criswell, et ux., Petitioners, v. David S. KING, Respondent

parties: Gerald CRISWELL, III and Tracey Criswell, et ux., Petitioners, v. David S. KING, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of March, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted limited to the following issue: Whether Petitioner was required to object to the verdict prior the discharge of the jury where the verdict was not inconsistent?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
791 A.2d 1153
Gerald CRISWELL, III and Tracey Criswell, et ux., Petitioners, v. David S. KING, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 12, 2002.
